subject: Baseball
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: Misogynist rap lyrics and another failed steroid test are yet another sign that the Mets’ reputation as the city wallflower, relative to the Yankees, has largely been a myth.
snippet: Misogynist rap lyrics and another failed steroid test are yet another sign that the Mets’ reputation as the city wallflower, relative to the Yankees, has largely been a myth.
